title: What Next TBD: Uber Makes Nice With Cabs
description:
The rideshare company's founder once called taxis “evil.” Now, Uber might need them to survive.

Guest: Preetika Rana
Host: Lizzie O'Leary
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: New York City taxis are headed to the Uber app.
